comments.content:
Hey, is it fair for Stephen to edit out his ignorance of the second font?  
Especially when Edit is disabled for non-moderators… Tsk, tsk, tsk. :-)

hhp

Totally fair! Ok, not fair that the edit button was removed for everyone. Dunno what happened to that.

Yeah, I admit attempting to save myself from type ID humliation — but it was within a couple minutes, and not after Nick posted the answer.

\> not after Nick posted the answer.

Well, at least that means you were gracious enough not to swap your jaw-dropping lapse with the correct answer… Retract the guillotine, then.

hhp
Managing content should look good O:-)
